title: Fighter
data:
{{version031}}
{{flavour|Fighters usually start with a good weapon, a suit of heavy armour, a shield and a potion of might. They have a good general grounding in the arts of fighting.}}

==Preferred Species==
[[Hill Orc]], [[Minotaur]], [[Gargoyle]], [[Troll]], [[Armataur]] and [[Formicid]] are the recommended races if you pick a Fighter Background.

==Starting Equipment==
Some [[species]] may receive different items based on their unique restrictions.
*+0 [[weapon of choice]] ([[rapier]], [[flail]], [[war axe]], [[trident]], [[long sword]], or [[unarmed]])
**[[Formicid]]s can choose to receive a [[quarterstaff]] (as it is one-handed to them).
*+0 [[scale mail]]
*+0 [[buckler]]
*[[Potion of might]]

==Starting Skills and Stats==
Adjusted for your species' aptitudes:
*[[Fighting]]: 3
*Chosen Weapon's Skill: 2
*[[Armour (skill)|Armour]]: 3
*[[Shields (skill)|Shields]]: 3

Choosing Fighter adds 8 to your starting [[Strength]] and 4 to your starting [[Dexterity]].

==Strategy==
While Fighters may seem weak or "generic" compared to the more exotic [[backgrounds]], remember that your background is only your starting package. Unlike, say, [[Berserker]]s, Fighters are free to choose any god they like, like all those you cannot start the game with!

==History==
*Fighters were unchanged in the mostly-global background buff of [[0.29]] (they already had a potion of might).
*Prior to [[0.28]], fighters started with a [[kite shield]] instead of a [[buckler]].
*Prior to [[0.27]], [[kobold]]s (and [[halfling]]s) started with a kite shield instead of a buckler.
*Prior to [[0.14]], fighters did not start with a [[potion of might]] and most starting weapons were of a lower tier: [[short sword]] instead of [[cutlass]], [[mace]] instead of [[flail]], [[hand axe]] instead of [[war axe]], and [[falchion]] instead of [[long sword]]. They also started with 20 [[gold]].
